00030 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_NOTINRANGE_H
00031 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_UNARY_NOTINRANGE_H
00032 
00033 // Checks if a variable is in a fixed Range.
00034 template<typename Var>
00035   struct WatchNotInRangeConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00036 {
00037   virtual string constraint_name()
00038     { return "WatchedNotInRange"; }
00039 
00040   Var var;
00041 
00042   DomainInt range_min;
00043   DomainInt range_max;
00044 
00045   template<typename T>
00046   WatchNotInRangeConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var& _var, const T& _vals) :
00047   AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var(_var)
00048   { 
00049     if(_vals.size() != 2)
00050     {
00051       cerr << "The range of an 'NotInRange' constraint must contain 2 values!" << endl;
00052       abort();
00053     }
00054     
00055     range_min = _vals[0];
00056     range_max = _vals[1];
00057   }
00058 
00059   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00060     { return 2; }
00061 
00062   virtual void full_propagate()
00063   {  
00064     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();    
00065     // Ignore empty ranges
00066     if(range_min > range_max)
00067       return;
00068       
00069     if(var.getMax() <= range_max)
00070     {
00071       var.setMax(range_min - 1);
00072       return;
00073     }
00074     
00075     if(var.getMin() >= range_min)
00076     {
00077       var.setMin(range_max + 1);
00078       return;
00079     }
00080     
00081     if(var.isBound())
00082     {
00083       var.addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainChanged);
00084       propagate(NULL); 
00085     }
00086     else
00087     {
00088       for(DomainInt i = range_min; i <= range_max; ++i)
00089         var.removeFromDomain(i); 
00090     }
00091   }
00092 
00093 
00094   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00095   {
00096     PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchNotInRange);
00097     D_ASSERT(var.isBound());
00098     
00099     if(var.getMax() <= range_max)
00100     {
00101       var.setMax(range_min - 1);
00102       return;
00103     }
00104     
00105     if(var.getMin() >= range_min)
00106     {
00107       var.setMin(range_max + 1);
00108       return;
00109     }
00110   }
00111 
00112   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00113   {
00114     D_ASSERT(v_size == 1);
00115     return (v[0] < range_min || v[0] > range_max);
00116   }
00117 
00118   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00119   { 
00120     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00121     vars.reserve(1);
00122     vars.push_back(var);
00123     return vars;
00124   }
00125 
00126   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00127   {  
00129     if(var.getMin() < range_min || var.getMin() > range_max)
00130     {
00131       assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, var.getMin()));
00132       return true;
00133     }
00134     
00135     if(var.getMax() < range_min || var.getMax() > range_max)
00136     {
00137       assignment.push_back(make_pair(0, var.getMax()));
00138       return true;
00139     }
00140     return false;
00141   }
00142 };
00143 
00144 template<typename VarArray1>
00145 AbstractConstraint*
00146 BuildCT_WATCHED_NOT_INRANGE(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const ConstraintBlob& b)
00147 { 
00148   return new WatchNotInRangeConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type>
00149     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], b.constants[0]); 
00150 }
00151 
00152 #endif
